p.k: In this episode we will visit the countries of the Maghreb and the south of Europe. Its’ history, the Hafsides, Marinids, Zayyanids and others who inhabited these lands. They were authentic empires, which at times cooperated with, and at times fought against al-Andalusia, on the other side of the strait. Spain and Italy are the entrance to Europe for many Muslims. But it’s also an area for the development and commerce in both directions.
